          <title>
            <string language="it">Costituzioni</string>
            <string language="en">Constitutions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschaffenheiten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Constitutions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Constitutions</string>

          <language>en</language>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Gli allievi possono studiare le costituzioni del mondo (in scala mondiale) in questa esercitazione.</string>
            <string language="en">Students can study constitutions wordlwide in this exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer können Beschaffenheiten wordlwide
in dieser Übung studieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants peuvent étudier le wordlwide de 
constitutions dans cet exercice.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes podem estudar o wordlwide dos 
constitutions neste exercício.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές μπορούν να μελετήσουν το wordlwide 
συνταγμάτων σε αυτήν την άσκηση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes pueden estudiar wordlwide de las 
constituciones en este ejercicio.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
